mean.mean: 又一；再一；另一（事物或人）

entry.def: Another thing or person means an additional thing or person of the same type as one that already exists.
entry.tran: （同类事物中的）另一个，再一个

example.ex: Mrs. Madrigal buttered another piece of toast...
example.tran: 马德里加尔夫人给另一片烤面包涂上了黄油。

example.ex: We're going to have another baby.

entry.def: You use another when you want to emphasize that an additional thing or person is different to one that already exists.

example.ex: I think he's just going to deal with this problem another day...
example.tran: 我想他改天就会处理这个问题。

example.ex: The counsellor referred her to another therapist.
example.tran: 咨询指导让她去看另一位治疗专家。

entry.def: You use another at the beginning of a statement to link it to a previous statement.

example.ex: Another time of great excitement for us boys was when war broke out...
example.tran: 对我们男孩子来说另一个极度刺激的时刻是战争爆发。

example.ex: Another change that Sue made was to install central heating.
example.tran: 休所作的另一个改变是安装中央供暖系统。

entry.def: You use another before a word referring to a distance, length of time, or other amount, to indicate an additional amount.
entry.tran: （用在距离、时间段或其他量词之前）又…的，再…的

example.ex: Continue down the same road for another 2 kilometres until you reach the church of Santa Maria...
example.tran: 沿同一条路再往前走两公里，直至到达圣马丽亚教堂。

example.ex: He believes prices will not rise by more than another 4 per cent.
example.tran: 他认为物价涨幅不会再超过4个百分点。

entry.def: You use another in front of the name of a well-known person, place, or event to indicate that you think someone or something is just like that person, place, or event.
entry.tran: （用于有名的人物、地点或事件前表示与其类似的）另一个…，类似…的

example.ex: You may never be another Hemingway, but you can learn to write well.
example.tran: 你可能成不了第二个海明威，但你可以练就一手好文笔。

entry.def: You use one another to indicate that each member of a group does something to or for the other members.

example.ex: ...women learning to help themselves and one another...
example.tran: 学着自助和互助的妇女们

example.ex: The two countries do little trade with one another.
example.tran: 两国之间很少有贸易往来。

entry.def: If you talk about one thing after another, you are referring to a series of repeated or continuous events.

example.ex: They had faced one difficulty after another with bravery and dedication...
example.tran: 他们以无畏和无私奉献的精神迎接了一个又一个的困难。

example.ex: They kept going, destroying one store after another.
example.tran: 他们并未停手，摧毁了一家又一家商店。

entry.def: You use or another in expressions such as one kind or another when you do not want to be precise about which of several alternatives or possibilities you are referring to.
entry.tran: （表示不确指）各种不同的，各种各样的

example.ex: ...family members and visiting artists of one kind or another crowding the huge kitchen...
example.tran: 聚集在这个宽敞厨房里的家庭成员和来访的各类艺术家

example.ex: All of these industries have at one time or another been linked to cancer.
example.tran: 所有这些产业都曾在不同时期与癌症有过联系。

means.word_mean: 3. any of various alternatives; some other;
